page.para: I can see one el/e/phant. He wants to drink the wa/ter.
I can see two gi/raffes. They are drink/ing.
I can see three buf/fa/loes. They want to drink too.
I can see four birds. They are white.
I can see five im/pal/as. They are thirst/y.
I can see six wart/hogs. There are four ba/bies.
I can see sev/en ze/bras. They run to the wa/ter.
I can see eight frogs. They are swim/ming in the wa/ter.
I can see nine fish/es. They are swim/ming too.
And here comes the li/on! I can see the an/i/mals. Can you?
